001package ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.ByteStream;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.TcpSegment;
005import java.util.Optional;
006
007/**
008 * Port that aggregates TCP segments for a single flow into ordered byte streams.
009 * <p>Implementations may retain state per flow and are generally not thread-safe without external
010 * synchronization.</p>
011 *
012 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
013 */
014public interface FlowAssembler {
015  /**
016   * Accepts a TCP segment and, when new contiguous bytes become available, returns the slice as a
017   * {@link ByteStream}.
018   *
019   * @param segment TCP segment belonging to the flow managed by this assembler
020   * @return non-empty stream slice when new bytes are ready; otherwise {@link Optional#empty()}
021   * @throws Exception if segment processing fails
022   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
023   */
024  Optional<ByteStream> accept(TcpSegment segment) throws Exception;
025}
